Anyone know what the gold border around this comment is for?

> [{quoted}](name=AlienPrimate,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Pw3Ip6H2,comment-id=00180000,timestamp=2017-06-01T01:21:04.332+0000)
>
> Anyone know what the gold border around this comment is for?

It means you're looking at the active comment. Instead of the text being lighter, we've made things clearer by adding a border around whatever was hyperlinked.

Hey everyone, 

Due to the amazing response, applications are being closed. The first set of chat logs should be up Saturday.

Thank you everybody!

awww I wanted to join.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

So yeah, it's closed, I missed this one.

But for future references, is this reserved to accounts on NA, or can I participate from EUW? I never flames or just say things like "noob, you're bad", but I can be a little... blunt when I comment on plays, and I'd be really curious to have feedback on how it's perceived by the community.
*(Sweat intensifies as I remember I'm a Yasuo main)*

I'm OK with you pulling my logs. 

I'm curious what you'd even get to use for the example, it's pretty rare for me to talk enough for it to matter.

PS: I really like the customizations you've got going on here, it feels a lot nicer than the rest of the boards.
Thank DTN for the boards swag. He did the hard work.
